column1: Local Foods////My husband has been raving about this restaurant since last trying it a few months ago. I was happy to have an opportunity to finally try it and it didn't disappoint! My plan was to try the shrimp and crab sandwich
column2: but was talked into trying the crunchy chicken by the guy at the register as it had recently won national recognition. I'm not a huge fan of pretzel buns
column3: but wow - this pretzel bun was outstanding. Fresh fresh fresh and tasty. There was a generous portion of sliced chicken and great toppings.  I selected to kale salad and vegetarian potato salad. The kale salad was pretty good
column4: but I wouldn't get the veggie potato salad again
column5: which was just okay.  I did enjoy the mintade drink from the fountain. Overall
column6: very good. I will definitely be back to try the shrimp and crab sandwich.
